questions.quote: Awright, let's see. How about Mug?  Mug Costanza, that's original.  Or uh, Ketchup? Pretty name for a girl.
Well I'm very excited about this. I've always wanted to see how those sketch artists do it.
Yeah but we reversed positions so there was no funny business.
Hey, you'll never guess who I bumped into. This guy Clyde. He's in your friend John Germaine's band there.
"The panties your mother laid out for you"?  What does that mean?
I can't believe we're doing this. This is the kind of thing they do in the movies.
Because, I was thinking... are you at all concerned that living in the same building will, y'know... cramp our styles?
Yeah, you know it's a shame his parents didn't get divorced thirty years ago. He could have been normal.
Listen, this is a million dollars we're talkin' about, Jerry, now this is the big league, the big time, now I need you on my team, Jerry!
That's it, that's it! I warned you kids. I told you not to play in front of my house. This time, I'm keepin' it. And you're not getting back your rock either!
